divs: sighting details it was about 3:am on august 21 2012 . i was at home in bed at 3rd floor apt in harlem nyc . felt like some one entered my room . i got up looked around ,turned lights off went back to sleep. i kept tossing and turning . had reoccurring dream of a nuclear blast coming from a worm hole out of thin air. the blast happened above the ocean just below the statue of liberty in nyc. the earth split manhattan sank . in the dream i ran to the edge of my block tried to jump from my side of this widening cliff to the other side i couldn't . woke up third time and this grey alien with long arms some what luminous eyes , maybe reflecting tge street light . this gray was standing above my bed near my head peering down at an angle . my eyes opened .it continued to stare .i grabed my camera got a shot as it floated through the open window. in the enhance frame it turns as it is leaving . unknown or un seen at tge time there was another being the other being.i discovered this as it was is the photo and was not visible . both of these beings were looking back as you can see in the photos. the beings then simply disappeared \faded ???
